header.title: JaxMeAPI: A clean room implementation of the JAXB API

body.p: JaxMeAPI is clean room implementation of the JAXB API. Unlike the reference implementation this one comes under a very moderate open source license, the Apache License.
body.note:
The reference implementation is now distributed from Java Dot Net. Though the source may be viewed, the license model used does not really seem to be open source (in the usual sense of
The Open Source Initiative definition). Our implementation (of the basic API) is licensed under the Apache License a truely open source license allowing easy redistribution. Therefore, we continue to recommend our implementation.
